house_listing.comments: Cozy, clean and well kept manufactured home in beautiful area 6 miles west of Willamina. Property is on a knoll with lots of privacy and view. Nice sunroom, kitchen, and eating area with a view of the mountains. Roof was recently redone, swamp cooler and set up for wood stove. Well built 3 bay garage with heavy timbers, has darling 1 bdrm, 1 bath, living and guest quarters above. Additional nicely built carport 41x15. Apple and pear trees. Room for a few horses or cattle.
